strapiPost.title: Broadway Veteran Returns Home For Production Of Sweeney Todd
strapiPost.content:
Northwest Arkansas native Coleman Ray Clark will direct the classic musical Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street at the Pat Ellison Performing Arts Center in Springdale this summer, with shows from Jul 20-23 and 27-30.

  • Homecoming: Known for his work on and off Broadway, Clark brings home an impressive theatrical background to showcase the talents of almost 100 locals cast in the show and provide learning opportunities for students engaging with the broader NWA creative community.
  • No Place Like London: Presented by Arts One Presents, Sweeney Todd follows the infamous barber as he seeks revenge in 19th-century London. It is a tale of revenge, dark humor, and unforgettable melodies.

Get your tickets on Arts One Presents' website HERE before they're gone!
